about_the_game:
Runeroots is a tactical turn-based RPG featuring town building and crafting mechanics. Travel from planet to planet gathering resources, rescuing trapped townsfolk, and discovering runic powers and artifacts to help you stop the invaders.

Rebuild Your Home

Restore the town in your own style. Craft housing, stores, and decorations to build the perfect village. Populate the town with villagers you rescue on your adventures.

Tactical Turn-Based Battles


Runeroots features a grid-less turn-based combat system for the ultimate strategic experience. Fight against dozens of unique enemies in randomized encounters, or explore handcrafted dungeons for an extra tough challenge with even greater rewards.

Play Solo or Up to 4 Player Online Co-op

Runeroots features a party of 4 champions in every playthrough. Friends can join your playthrough and take control of party members when playing online.

Customize Your Powers


Collect 8 different runes and use them to craft new powers, or variations of existing powers. Each of the 6 combat classes will have 18 unique powers with 3 additional variations each, for a total of 432 powers.

Decorate Your Home

Each of the 4 champions in your party can be assigned a home in town. Customize the wallpaper, flooring, and trim with patterns you unlock. Add furniture to make the place your own and show off the awesome loot you have collected.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel i3 Skylake | AMD FX-6000
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon R7 260X | NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 Ti
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel i5 Coffee Lake | AMD Ryzen 3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 570 | NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Your planet has been destroyed by invaders. Gather, craft, and rebuild your village in your own style. Explore other destroyed planets as you fight back the enemy in tactical turn-based battles. Play solo or up to 4 players in online co-op.
